summary.para: Grid is the base class for plotting a layout of uniformly spaced points and lines.
The size of the gap between each cell in the Grid.
The layout of the cells in the Grid.
The size of each cell in the Grid.
The cell swizzle for the Grid.
Get the logical center coordinate of a grid cell in local space.

returns.para: Center of the cell transformed into local space coordinates.

summary.para: Get the logical center coordinate of a grid cell in world space.

returns.para: Center of the cell transformed into world space coordinates.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Grid.InverseSwizzle(UnityEngine.GridLayout/CellSwizzle,UnityEngine.Vector3)

summary.para: Does the inverse swizzle of the given position for given swizzle order.

member.param: Determines the rearrangement order for the inverse swizzle.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Grid.Swizzle(UnityEngine.GridLayout/CellSwizzle,UnityEngine.Vector3)

summary.para: Swizzles the given position with the given swizzle order.

member.param: Determines the rearrangement order for the swizzle.

summary.para: An abstract class that defines a grid layout.
The size of the gap between each cell in the layout.
The layout of the cells.
The size of each cell in the layout.
The cell swizzle for the layout.
The layout of the GridLayout.
Hexagonal layout for cells in the GridLayout.
Isometric layout for cells in the GridLayout.
Isometric layout for cells in the GridLayout where any Z cell value set will be added as a Y value.
Rectangular layout for cells in the GridLayout.
Swizzles cell positions to other positions.
Keeps the cell positions at XYZ.
Swizzles the cell positions from XYZ to XZY.
Swizzles the cell positions from XYZ to YXZ.
Swizzles the cell positions from XYZ to YZX.
Swizzles the cell positions from XYZ to ZXY.
Swizzles the cell positions from XYZ to ZYX.
Converts a cell position to local position space.

returns.para: Local position of the cell position.

summary.para: Converts an interpolated cell position in floats to local position space.

returns.para: Local position of the cell position.

summary.para: Converts a cell position to world position space.

returns.para: World position of the cell position.

summary.para: Returns the local bounds for a cell at the location.

returns.para: Local bounds of cell at the position.

summary.para: Get the default center coordinate of a cell for the set layout of the Grid.
Converts a local position to cell position.

returns.para: Cell position of the local position.

summary.para: Converts a local position to cell position.

returns.para: Interpolated cell position of the local position.

summary.para: Converts a local position to world position.

returns.para: World position of the local position.

summary.para: Converts a world position to cell position.

returns.para: Cell position of the world position.

summary.para: Converts a world position to local position.

returns.para: Local position of the world position.
